mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_LEVEL, USER_POINT, VIEWABLE FROM USER_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw} AND WITHDRAWAL = 'N'
SELECT USER_ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_LEVEL, USER_POINT, JOIN_DATE, WITHDRAWAL, WITHDRAW_DATE FROM USER_TBL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}

(SELECT (SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM TABS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'CONSULT_BOARD_TBL') AS BOARD_NAME, C_BOARD_TITLE AS POST_TITLE, C_BOARD_CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE FROM CONSULT_BOARD_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT (SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM TABS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'LECTURE_BOARD_TBL') AS BOARD_NAME, L_BOARD_TITLE AS POST_TITLE, L_BOARD_CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE FROM LECTURE_BOARD_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT (SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM TABS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'FINISH_BOARD_TBL') AS BOARD_NAME, F_BOARD_TITLE AS POST_TITLE, F_BOARD_CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE FROM FINISH_BOARD_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT SUM(CNT) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CONSULT_BOARD_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM LECTURE_BOARD_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM FINISH_BOARD_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
